title: Carring Capacity of the Problem
text: In this problem, the carrying capacity is $$558$$.

title: Using the Intersect Feature On a Calculator
text: Graph $$y=279$$ and $$\frac{558}{1+54.8e^{-0.462 x}}$$. Then, find the $$x$$ coordinate of their intersection by going to the calculate menu, selecting the intersect option, and identifying the two different $$\frac{curves}{lines}$$ on the graph.
